question: Who among the following was not among the seven members of the Drafting Committee?
explanation:
Following were the Seven members of the Drafting Committee-
1. Dr. B.R. Ambedkar
2. N Gopalaswamy
3. Alladi Krishnaswamy Ayyar
4. Dr K M Munshi
5. Syed Mohammad Saadullah
6. N Madhava Rau
7. T T Krishnamachari
